name: Chicken Tagine with Preserved Lemons and Olives
steps: Slice the onions and mince the garlic.
In a tagine or heavy pot, brown the chicken pieces in olive oil until lightly golden.
Add the onions and garlic, sauté until soft and translucent.
Add ginger, saffron, salt and pepper, stir well.
Add the preserved lemon quarters and olives.
Cover and simmer on low heat for about 60–90 minutes, until the chicken is tender.
Adjust seasoning if needed and serve hot.
description: A classic Moroccan chicken tagine slow-cooked with preserved lemons and olives.
